<div class="row">
  <form>
    <div class='row'>
      <div class='large-12 columns'>
        <label>Name<input type='text' of-id='currentTask.name' placeholder=' ' /></label>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class='row'>
      <div class='large-6 columns'>
        <label>PageName<input type='text' of-id='currentTask.pagename' placeholder=' ' /></label>
      </div>
      <div class='large-6 columns'>
        <label>Script File<input type='text' of-id='currentTask.scriptfile' placeholder=' ' /></label>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class='row'>
      <div class='large-12 columns'>
        <label>ScheduledTime<input type='text' list="scheduleTimes" of-id='currentTask.scheduledtime' placeholder=' ' /></label>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class='row'>
      <div class='large-6 columns'>
        [{InputBoolean id="enabledCheckBox" text="Enabled"}]
      </div>
      <div class='large-6 columns'>
        [{InputBoolean id="debugCheckBox" text="Debug"}]
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class='row'>
      <a href="#" class="button" onclick="addTask(); return false;">{{addTaskText}}</a>
      <a href="#" class="button" onclick="createTask(); return false;">New Task</a>
    </div>
  </form>
</div>

<datalist id="scheduleTimes">
  <option value="Every ten seconds"></option>
  <option value="Every minute"></option>
  <option value="Every ten minutes"></option>
  <option value="Every half hour"></option>
  <option value="Every hour"></option>
  <option value="Every day at 08:00"></option>
  <option value="On 01/01/1970 at 09:00"></option>
  <option value="On 01/01/1970"></option>
  <option value="script:{pageName: '', fileName: ''}"></option>
  <option value="Every week"></option>
  <option value="Every week on Monday"></option>
  <option value="Every month"></option>
  <option value="Every year"></option>
</datalist>
